steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the shape that you want to edit or format.
To edit the shape, right-click on it and choose 'Edit Shape' from the context menu.
To format the shape, right-click on it and choose 'Format Shape' from the context menu.
Follow the on-screen instructions to make the desired changes to the shape.
Click 'Save' to apply the changes to the shape.
